allow: Bash(echo "Making access request for Gerald (self-request)..." curl -s -X POST "http://localhost:3000/api/v1/access-requests" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN" -d '{""""targetUserId"""": """"'$USER_ID'"""", """"items"""": [{""""systemInstanceId"""": """"f42d9fc2-9c5a-4f78-95ba-3ff13d9e0b89"""", """"accessTierId"""": """"673e120d-d3d3-4d16-9ba0-51e74f7b1b16""""}], """"note"""": """"Testing request flow""""}')
Bash(TOKEN="c2FkeWFnZXJhbGRtQGdtYWlsLmNvbQ==" echo "=== Getting systems for sadyageraldm ===" curl -s "http://localhost:3000/api/v1/systems" -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN")

Bash(GERALD_TOKEN="Z2VyYWxkc0BzaWx2ZXJ0cmVlYnJhbmRzLmNvbQ==" echo "=== Pending requests for geralds (manager of sadyageraldm) ===" curl -s "http://localhost:3000/api/v1/access-requests/pending" -H "Authorization: Bearer $GERALD_TOKEN")
